workshoptitle: Use OCI VSS Service Integration with Qualys

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 0: Deploy VSS Qualys integration with Oracle Resource Manager
Lab 1: Configure Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Components
Lab 2: Deploy VSS integration with Qualys and Required Configuration
Lab 3: Explore Scan and Vulnerability Reports
Need Help?
